name: BL Book
definition: Repel targets with orbiting BL Books.

name: CEO's Tears
definition: Drops a falling bounce ball on a random target. Size of ball varies between characters.

name: Elite Lava Bucket
definition: Drop lava on the ground, burning targets slowly.

name: Wamy Water
definition: Create a splash of unknown water in front, knocking targets back.

name: Bounce Ball
definition: Drops a falling bounce ball on a random target. Size of ball varies between characters.

name: Cutting Board
definition: Create a defensive wall that damages targets behind you. Effectiveness is increased on certain characters.

name: EN's Curse
definition: Fires cursed energy in front. On hit, there is a chance to spread another Curse towards another nearby target.

name: Fan Beam
definition: Shoot a powerful laser beam from the microphone.

name: Glowstick
definition: Throw a glowstick to a nearby target and then spins back to player.

name: Holo Bomb
definition: A bomb that explodes, dealing damage to all nearby targets.

name: Idol Song
definition: Magical music notes that float vertically in both directions.

name: Owl Dagger
definition: A very fast dagger that slashes continuously in front.

name: Plug Type Asacoco
definition: Fire a fast piercing tail targeted at a random target.

name: Psycho Axe
definition: Throw an axe that spirals outward from the player.

name: Sausage
definition: If there are targets nearby, swings a small sausage towards the closest target.

name: Spider Cooking
definition: Create an area of miasma around, dealing slow damage to targets inside.

name: X-Potato
definition: Throw a potato that bounces around the screen before exploding into an X.
